name: Bit Blocker
description:
Bit Blocker is a fun platformer made for the Miz Game Jam. The game focuses on a 1-bit player navigating an environment that does it's best to distract you from making it to your goal. With the games as fun music, enemies and spinning level, it becomes addicting to play. 

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys to move.

Space bar to jump

Left mouse button to shoot.
